Bash(git commit -m "fix: update XAI explainers to use LINBORG metrics

Updated all three XAI components to support new 14-metric LINBORG schema:

1. SHAP Explainer (shap_explainer.py):
   - Changed FEATURE_NAMES from old 4 metrics to all 14 LINBORG metrics
   - Now analyzes: cpu_user_pct, cpu_sys_pct, cpu_iowait_pct, cpu_idle_pct,
     java_cpu_pct, mem_used_pct, swap_used_pct, disk_usage_pct, net_in_mb_s,
     net_out_mb_s, back_close_wait, front_close_wait, load_average, uptime_days

2. Attention Visualizer (attention_visualizer.py):
   - Updated to use cpu_user_pct instead of old cpu_pct
   - Fallback support for legacy metric names

3. Counterfactual Generator (counterfactual_generator.py):
   - All scenarios now detect and use LINBORG metric names
   - Updated: Stabilize, Restart, Reduce Memory, Scale Out scenarios
   - Fallback support for both old (cpu_pct, mem_pct) and new (cpu_user_pct, mem_used_pct)

This fixes the ""0 neutral"" bug in XAI insights tab - now shows actual metric data!
